snippet.title: Pikmin 1² - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
After nearly 4 years in development, my ultimate Pikmin project is complete! Pikmin 1² aims to recreate the original Pikmin using the engine of Pikmin 2 as a base, along with loads of new improvements. It also features a whole second adventure starring Louie, and a complete randomizer with loads of options. Fully playable with a friend, and (for the most part) on a real console!
Thank you so much for your extended patience, and I hope this will be worth the wait. I cannot emphasize enough the amount of work that went into the creation of this, and I'm sure more videos will come over time to show that.
And don't worry, I'll definitely be uploading the whole soundtrack here this time.

You can download it RIGHT NOW from my website, at https://pikhacker.github.io/

In the off chance that someone at Nintendo reads this, just know I've made 0$ from any of this, and I have no plans to make this for the Switch port, you can keep that one (Wii is possible though).

Make sure you join my Discord if you haven't, you'll want people to share your playthrough with!
https://discord.gg/WHSaSS5

And follow me on these places:
https://x.com/PikHacker
https://bsky.app/profile/pikhacker.bsky.social
